meanings.sent1: The serifed letters on the sign were easy to read.
meanings.sent2: The serifed font gave the document a classic look.
meanings.sent3: The serifed book cover made the novel seem more sophisticated.
meanings.sent4: Her serifed handwriting added a touch of elegance to the invitation.
meanings.sent5: The serifed design of the logo made it stand out among the others.

meanings.definition: To add serifs to a typeface.
meanings.sent1: She serifed the font to make it more stylish.
meanings.sent2: The designer serifed the text to enhance readability.
meanings.sent3: He serifed the letters with precision, like an artist adding final touches.
meanings.sent4: The typographer serifed the typeface, transforming it into a work of art.
meanings.sent5: Serifing the font gave it a professional and polished appearance.
